name: Igglybuff
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jigglypuff from your hand onto Igglybuff (this counts as evolving Igglybuff) and remove all damage counters from Igglybuff.

attacks.name: Inquire
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If you didn’t play any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, draw 2 more cards.
